item.title: Breaking Through the Stigma as Access Expands to GLP-1s
item.description: The perception of GLP-1s — and the people who use them — is getting better, but work still must be done to avoid stigma. Medscape Medical News

item.title: N-AVD, BrECADD Win in Advanced Hodgkin Lymphoma Trials
item.description: In newly diagnosed cases, the regimens outperformed BV-AVD and BEACOPP, respectively. Medscape Medical News

item.title: Relapsed or Refractory Follicular Lymphoma SOC Could Change
item.description: Adding epcoritamab to R2 regimen is associated with dramatically improved outcomes. Medscape Medical News

item.title: Experts Worry About the Interventional Cardiology Pipeline

item.title: Multiple Psychiatric Disorders Share Genetic Roots
item.description: An analysis of DNA from millions of individuals has identified shared genetic pathways across psychiatric disorders. These findings could reshape how ...
